information: Efbe Elektrogeräte GmbH. Many of our products are manufactured at our factory in Bad Blankenburg. Our focal points – wellness, infrared light and facial tanners – form the basis of the efbe range's many years of market success. Products made in Germany have always inspired confidence, not only among German customers but with overseas clients too. Our flexibility has frequently shown that even small series can achieve great success. Production therefore needs to be made profitable and flexible. Our products are exceptionally high quality and we offer secure employment. Efbe Elektrogeräte GmbH is committed to its location in Germany, though the company is still a global player that enjoys success in numerous countries. We are determined to continue the success story of efbe Elektrogeräte GmbH long into the future, which is why are already giving young talent the opportunity to further develop in various different areas.
